--- The rules ---
1) No previews - of either results or assets!
2) Stay in this editor at all times
3) No measurement tools
4) Stop coding when the time's up
5) Use the "Download file" button and save the file as design.html in the same folder as the editor. Zip the dist-folder as your own name and send it in #dubrovnik17

Good luck and most important of all; have fun!

--- Assets ---

* Cover image: `assets/cover.jpg` Dimensions: 1720x560
* Logo image: `assets/logo.png` Dimensions: 63x47
* Episode preview images path: `assets/e[episode number, 1 to 7]-preview.jpg` Dimensions: 960x540
* Cog icon: `assets/cog.png` Dimensions: 21x21
* Search icon: `assets/search.png` Dimensions: 21x21

Blue: #4292bc
